sentence.Network_en: The girls were nothing loth, for the house was splendid, and the welcome kind enough.
sentence.Network_cn: 姑娘们很愉快, 因为房子很是华丽的, 而且接待是相当热情.

sentence.Network_en: The new finance minister seems loth to cut income tax.
sentence.Network_cn: 新任财政部长似乎不愿削减所得税。

sentence.Network_en: Venn was loth to depart, for all on earth that interested him lay under this roof.
sentence.Network_cn: 文恩很不乐意走, 因为世界上唯一使他关心的人就在这所房子里.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(83) ... lot 签 loth 憎恶的 Lothario 好色之徒.
以l开头的英语英文单词 ... lose 失去；迷失；输掉 loth 不情愿的,勉强的 lotion 洗液,洗净,饮料.

Mr Mugabe loth to accept them . Probably only Mr Zuma could force him to ., 穆加贝一定不愿接受 , 也许只有祖马能够强迫他接受.

list.abs: hast thou utterly rejected Judah ? hath thy soul lothed Zion ? why hast thou smitten us andis no healing for us ? we looked for peace andis no good ;你全然弃掉犹大吗？你心厌恶锡安吗？为何击打我们，以致无法医治呢？我们指望平安，却得不着好处。
they are loth to lend because they are worried that they do not have enough capital to meet losses on their existing loans .银行不愿意出借，因为他们担心其资本不足以弥补目前贷款的损失。
But powerful soldiers in Rwanda army are apparently loth to hand Mr Nkunda over ., 这项任务可挺棘手的 , 因为在其中扮演着重要角色的卢旺达士兵们 , 很显然不愿意交出恩昆达.
Other African governments seem loth to interfere ., 其它非洲政府似乎很不愿意干涉这个事情.

means.word_mean: 1. unwillingness to do something contrary to your custom;

sentences.sentence: "loath to go on such short notice"
